pages.text: The Friendly Fire Flower causes damage you deal to yourself (e.g. hitting yourself with your own arrows) to be negated for free. Being set on fire will also grant fire resistance at the cost of durability, however this takes a second to activate (it won't save you from the inital burn). This item has very little durability, and therefore it is encouraged to apply Unbreaking and Mending to it as soon as possible.

The Friendly Fire Flower supports the following enchantments:$(br2)$(l)Mending$(): Vanilla effect$(br2)$(l)Unbreaking$(): Vanilla effect$(br2)$(l)Fire Protection$(): Increases the duration of the Fire Resistance effect given$(br2)$(l)Curse of Chromatic Twisting$(): Attackers and attacked mobs are ignited for 100 seconds, and reduces the chance to lose durability, however causes constant fire damage
$(o)Any similarities to powerups from popular IPs are purely coincidental.
